title: How to Make Four Cheese Marylands

steps.headline: Get out a large frying pan, then melt the butter over a low heat.
Add the onions, prosciutto, and garlic.
steps.description: Then sauté until the onion and garlic are soft.

steps.headline: Mix the onion mixture, breadcrumbs, cheese blend, ricotta, lemon rind, oregano and salt and pepper to taste.
Wet your fingers.
steps.description: Then carefully loosen the chicken's skin making a pocket out of it.

steps.headline: Feel the pocket with the cheese mixture.
Mix the potatoes, sliced garlic, oil, and seasoning in a frying pan.
Place the chicken over the vegetables in a pan.
steps.description: Place them in the oven at 180 °C (356 °F) for an hour or until the chicken is golden.

steps.headline: Serve the chicken with the vegetables and potatoes.

text: Get out a large frying pan, then melt the butter over a low heat.  Add the onions, prosciutto, and garlic. Then sauté until the onion and garlic are soft. Mix the onion mixture, breadcrumbs, cheese blend, ricotta, lemon rind, oregano and salt and pepper to taste.  Wet your fingers. Then carefully loosen the chicken's skin making a pocket out of it. Feel the pocket with the cheese mixture.  Mix the potatoes, sliced garlic, oil, and seasoning in a frying pan.  Place the chicken over the vegetables in a pan. Place them in the oven at 180 °C (356 °F) for an hour or until the chicken is golden. Serve the chicken with the vegetables and potatoes.
